rules_text:
White Forest Tiger can't be blocked by more than one creature.
Mount {2}{G}{G} [i]({2}{G}{G}: Pair this creature with another unpaired creature you control. That creature becomes this creature's rider. This creature can't attack or block as long as it has a rider. Mount only as a sorcery.)[/i]
White Forest Tiger's rider gets +3/+3 and can't be blocked by more than one creature.
